item.title: Tier lists
item.description: Here I will rank the items of various lists by my opinion of good they are, which is of course objectively correct in all cases.

item.title: Factorial in Mathematica
item.description: Here is a list of (mostly) increasingly stupid ways of calculating the factorial of n in Mathematica.
